### Source[flametree package ](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/flametree/flametree.pdf)

```{r}
#devtools::install_github("djnavarro/flametree")
library(flametree)
library(dplyr)
library(ragg)

set.seed(123)

# pick some colors 
shades <- c("#002060", "#a56d67", "#11a536", "#b1044f")

# data structure defining the trees
dat <- flametree_grow(trees = 27,
                      shift_x = spark_nothing()) %>% 
  slice(-c(10001:10287))

# draw the plot
plot <- dat %>% 
  flametree_plot(
    background = "antiquewhite",
    palette = shades,
    #style = plain" (the default), "voronoi", "wisp", "nativeflora", "minimal", or "themegray"
    style = "nativeflora" 
  ) 
 
flametree_save(plot, filename = "22_1_flametree.png", height = 8, width = 8, dpi = 320)
```
